name: Avenue
description: Make the most of that special skein of fingering yarn with the Avenue Scarf! It’s simple garter stitch scarf, with a few polished details, that maximizes the use of yardage and shows of the yarn’s own colours.
full_text: Make the most of that special skein of fingering yarn with the Avenue Scarf! It’s simple garter stitch scarf, with a few polished details, that maximizes the use of yardage and shows of the yarn’s own colours. Choose from Fingering Weight on its own (A) or add a strand of mohair for a little extra fuzz (B). This scarf is very adaptable for other weights, yarn combinations, or dimensions.
